dialogues.text: Memories flash through your mind. Mountain peak, power, ascension.
Something went wrong. Falling, darkness, pain.

You're finally awake! I've been waiting for you. You need to rebuild your strength. Go to the cultivation page and upgrade you base cultivation rate. This will help you. in the next step. It will help you see me better too.

well done! now you can see me better. Something went wrong on the peak. You need to find out what happened. before we head out you need a spirit to protect yourself. Go to the summon page and summon your first spirit!
We'll have to keep cultivating and summoning spirits to get stronger. Lets head out for now and start our journey!

title: First Cultivation
description: Learn the basics of Qi cultivation

dialogues.text: Close your eyes and feel the flow of Qi around you. It moves like water, yet burns like fire.
You follow the Elder's guidance, feeling a warm sensation building in your core.
Good! You have a natural affinity. Now, direct that energy through your meridians.
As you practice, the Qi flows more easily. You can feel yourself growing stronger with each breath.

title: Spirit Bonding
description: Form your first bond with a spirit companion

dialogues.text: Cultivators do not walk the path alone. Spirit companions will aid you on your journey.
The Elder gestures toward a glowing summoning circle etched into the ancient stones.
Use your Qi to call forth a spirit. They will sense your essence and those who resonate with you will answer.
You channel your energy into the circle. It flares with brilliant light!
When the light fades, a magnificent spirit stands before you, ready to join your journey.
You have learned well, but knowledge without practice is worthless. You must face the Trial of Initiation.
The Elder leads you to a massive stone arena, its walls covered in the names of countless cultivators who came before.
Within this arena, you will face manifestations of spiritual energy. Work with your spirit companion to overcome them.
A rift tears open in the center of the arena. Dark energy begins to coalesce into a threatening form.
Remember your training. Trust in your spirits, and victory shall be yours. Begin!

title: Ancient Wisdom
description: Discover the secrets of the five elements

dialogues.text: You have proven yourself worthy. Now I shall teach you of the Five Elements that govern all cultivation.
The Elder summons five orbs of energy, each pulsing with different colored light.
Wood feeds Fire, Fire creates Earth, Earth bears Metal, Metal collects Water, and Water nourishes Wood.
But remember - Wood also parts Earth, Earth dams Water, Water quenches Fire, Fire melts Metal, and Metal chops Wood.
